name: Fast Cards
description:
Fast Cards is a Slay the Spire-ish game.  A roguelike card game where you gotta go fast at selecting and playing the cards. If you play your cards fast enough, you'll get the combo going and have bonuses.

In this game you'll be advancing up to 20 enemies to achive victory. It also has no art, it is just gameplay and has no saving option, so if you want to defeat all enemies, you'll have to do it in one playthrough. 

Anythign you want to share about this game you can comment it below.
